comments.body:
How close are we with having an `explain` parameter in all callers (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/issues/34059)? Can `explain` become a mandatory parameter?

Same for the other variants of "expect (no) error"...

Had it as an action item to check back on #34059 this week.
But last time I checked there were still a good amount of places where annotations (`explain`) need to be added.
